OrgName.entry: THE STROKE ASSOCIATION - FAMILY AND CARER SUPPORT SERVICE

Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides emotional support for stroke survivors and their carers and information to help people understand the effects of stroke support and discharge planning. Offers advice and support to make healthier lifestyle choices to help prevent further strokes, as well as signposting to ongoing support from relevant providers of care to meet family needs and access carer support groups and stroke clubs. Also provides support and advice on how to get help from health services, social services and voluntary organisations.
